abstract: U.S. striker Jozy Altidore is getting regular chances to play for his club, and that can only mean more chances for him to score.
snippet: U.S. striker Jozy Altidore is getting regular chances to play for his club, and that can only mean more chances for him to score.

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: United States Men's National Soccer Team

lead_paragraph: HARRISON, N.J. - There is something oddly elliptical about a coach, in this case Jurgen Klinsmann, who says something that seems obvious but often is not.

headline.main: For Altidore, Playing Time Is Positive Development
